report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters, LEVANA compatible
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters. LEVANA compatible output columns for butterfly records.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id and occ.deleted=false -- to get sensitivity_precision JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values count_val JOIN occurrence_attributes count_attr on count_attr.id=count_val.occurrence_attribute_id and count_attr.deleted=false and count_attr.system_function='sex_stage_count' ) ON count_val.occurrence_id=o.id AND count_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms count_val_term on count_val_term.id=count_val.int_value and count_attr.data_type='L' JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: sref_system
param.description: Output either GB or Irish grid system

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when occ.sensitivity_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: CASE WHEN lower(o.entered_sref_system)='#sref_system#' THEN o.public_entered_sref ELSE CASE '#sref_system#' WHEN 'osgb' THEN CASE WHEN NOT (st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) BETWEEN 0 AND 700000) OR NOT (st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) BETWEEN 0 AND 1400000) THEN 'Out of range' ELSE CASE (CAST(st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER)/500000)*10 + (CAST(st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER)/500000) WHEN 0 THEN 'S' WHEN 1 THEN 'N' WHEN 10 THEN 'T' WHEN 11 THEN 'O' ELSE 'H' END || CASE (mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000)*10 + mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000 WHEN 0 THEN 'V' WHEN 1 THEN 'Q' WHEN 2 THEN 'L' WHEN 3 THEN 'F' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 10 THEN 'W' WHEN 11 THEN 'R' WHEN 12 THEN 'M' WHEN 13 THEN 'G' WHEN 14 THEN 'B' WHEN 20 THEN 'X' WHEN 21 THEN 'S' WHEN 22 THEN 'N' WHEN 23 THEN 'H' WHEN 24 THEN 'C' WHEN 30 THEN 'Y' WHEN 31 THEN 'T' WHEN 32 THEN 'O' WHEN 33 THEN 'J' WHEN 34 THEN 'D' WHEN 40 THEN 'Z' WHEN 41 THEN 'U' WHEN 42 THEN 'P' WHEN 43 THEN 'K' WHEN 44 THEN 'E' ELSE '-' END || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),27700)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') END WHEN 'osie' THEN CASE WHEN NOT (st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),29903)) BETWEEN 0 AND 500000) OR NOT (st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),29903)) BETWEEN 0 AND 500000) THEN 'Out of range' ELSE CASE 'E' ELSE '-' END || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),29903)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom),29903)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') END END END
